fields.headline: Book ahead
fields.bodyText: Venetian mask parade Everyone's favourite souvenir from Venice - the mask - becomes an essential accessory when the city enjoys its pre-Lent carnival: in 2003, the streets and squares will be packed with revellers from February 21 to March 4. Three nights at the new four-star Hotel Santa Marina (a converted convent) during the carnival costs from £556 including flights and water taxi transfers with Kirker Holidays (020-7231 3333, kirkerholidays.com). Grandstand view in Symi There is nowhere better to witness the explosive Greek celebration of Easter -on April 27 next year- than in the natural amphitheatre of the harbour at Symi with its tiers of neoclassic mansions. Fireworks and flares light up the harbour. Seven nights at the Villa Hanni in Chorio costs £570 with Laskarina (01629 822203, laskarina.co.uk).
